questions.question: Outputs documents 'transaction display fields TRNID01O-TDATE10O etc.' in COTRN0AO (citations 534,542), but code populates TRNID01I-TDATE10I etc. in COTRN0AI (e.g. lines 392 MOVE TRAN-ID TO TRNID01I OF COTRN0AI, 394 TDATE01I, no moves to any *O fields for transaction data)

SEND-TRNLST-SCREEN at lines 534/542 sends FROM(COTRN0AO) which only populates header (lines 571-574 TITLE*O), ERRMSGO (531), CURDATEO/CURTIMEO (580/586), but transaction data is only in COTRN0AI *I fields (POPULATE-TRAN-DATA lines 381-445); does the map display AI fields via AO send?
Paragraphs section lists PROCESS-PAGE-FORWARD (279) but omits PROCESS-PAGE-BACKWARD at line 333 which implements PF7 backward paging (STARTBR 335, READPREV loop 351, etc.)
Data_flow writes_to COTRN0AO lists TRNID01O, TDATE01O, TDESC01O, TAMT001O etc. (citation 532,324,580), but 532 is ERRMSGO, 324 is PAGENUMI OF COTRN0AI, 580 CURDATEO; no code populates TRNID01O etc.

What about INITIALIZE-TRAN-DATA paragraph at line 450 which clears screen fields before populating (called lines 291,345), and other unlisted paragraphs like RETURN-TO-PREV-SCREEN (510), POPULATE-HEADER-INFO (567)?
